name: The promissed garden
description:
(WEB VERSION) https://aletmdec.itch.io/the-promised-garden-web

This game was made for "Bored pixels Jam 9 - Extra Flavor" with the theme "Environment changes you" (: 

Please use: 

W-A-S-D ------ to move around 
Mouse Right Button ------- to shoot 

We sincerely hope you like it as much as we do ! good luck ! (;
